full_transcript: Um, okay. So, we have this product that replaces motors. It's made of carbon. When electricity goes through it, it gets shorter... like a muscle. It helps with robotics because it's not as heavy as a motor. We use it for robots to make them move better.

segments.text: Um, okay. So, we have this product that replaces motors. It's made of carbon.
